/* com.innobiz.orange.web.or.dao.OrUserPwHDao.selectOrUserPwH */
SELECT
M.*, (SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = M.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM ( SELECT * FROM (
SELECT
TOP (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC}) ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY ${orderBy}N.ODUR_UID DESC, N.PW_TYP_CD DESC, N.MOD_DT DESC) AS RNUM, N.* FROM (SELECT
T.ODUR_UID, T.PW_TYP_CD, CONVERT(VARCHAR(19), T.MOD_DT, 120) MOD_DT, T.MODR_UID, T.PW_ENC,
(SELECT RESC_VA FROM OR_RESC_B WHERE RESC_ID = (SELECT RESC_ID FROM OR_USER_B WHERE USER_UID = T.MODR_UID) AND LANG_TYP_CD = ISNULL(#{queryLang, jdbcType=VARCHAR},'ko')) MODR_NM,
FROM OR_USER_PW_H T
AND T.ODUR_UID = #{odurUid, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.PW_TYP_CD = #{pwTypCd, jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND T.MOD_DT = CONVERT(DATETIME, #{modDt, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 120) ${whereSqllet}
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ORDER BY T.ODUR_UID, T.PW_TYP_CD, T.MOD_DT
) N ) M WHERE RNUM > (#{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} - 1) * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} AND RNUM <= #{pageNo, jdbcType=NUMERIC} * #{pageRowCnt, jdbcType=NUMERIC} ) M
